subsection.name: Description
subsection.div: Checks that any combination of String literals is on the left side of an equals() comparison. Also checks for String literals assigned to some field (such as someString.equals(anotherString = "text")).
subsection.p: Rationale: Calling the equals() method on String literals will avoid a potential NullPointerException. Also, it is pretty common to see null checks right before equals comparisons but following this rule such checks are not required.

tr.td: Control whether to ignore String.equalsIgnoreCase(String) invocations.
